name: Twist 5
description:
Welcome to Twist 5!

After placing a gem on the board, you need to pick one of the four quarters of the game board to rotate -- 90 degrees either clockwise or counterclockwise.  

If a player gets five in a row, they win!  A winning line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal.

If the board fills up with no winner, it's a draw.

Red is the first player.  It is common to alternate the first player and play best of five.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Twist 5 is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game Pentago.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
